Although the mysterious demigods known as the Forsaken disappeared eons ago, many calignis continue to follow their ancient traditions of worship. [Owbs](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=253), once the Forsaken's servants, still respond to caligni prayers. Caligni callers serve as the priests of their communities, calling upon these shadowy owb patrons for guidance, favors, and power. Their most important ceremony, the blanching, determines the potential of most newborn calignis and shapes their eventual forms. Due to their close ties to the malevolent owbs, most callers exhibit cruel and inscrutable natures. They often lead caligni enclaves alongside [caligni stalkers](/Monsters.aspx?ID=66) as spiritual advisors. Callers tend to be highly superstitious, seeing omens everywhere, and they avoid revealing details of their rituals even to other calignis. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 24 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 19 [Caligni Caller](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1088) **Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 40 **Perception** +11; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Caligni](/Languages.aspx?ID=28), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11) **Skills** [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +9, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +14, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +13, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +15 **Str** +2 **Dex** +5 **Con** +1 **Int** +1 **Wis** +1 **Cha** +4 **Items** [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3) --- **AC** 24 **Fort** +9 **Ref** +15 **Will** +11 **HP** 70 **Weaknesses** [light blindness](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=22) **Death Umbra** ([darkness](/Traits.aspx?ID=39)) When the caller dies, an explosion of shadow devours their body. Each creature in a 10-foot emanation must attempt a DC 22 Fortitude save.
**Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature is [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) for 1 minute.
**Failure** The creature is enfeebled 2 and [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) for 1 minute. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** dagger +15 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 1d4+4 piercing plus 1d6 negative **Occult Innate Spells** DC 24, attack +16 - **Cantrips (3rd)** [Chill Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=35), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66) - **2nd** [Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59) (at will) - **3rd** [Chilling Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=36) (×2), [Grim Tendrils](/Spells.aspx?ID=141) (×3) - **4th** [Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59) - **5th** [Shadow Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=275) **Rituals** DC 24 - **3rd** [Owb Pact](/Rituals.aspx?ID=45) **[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)** The caller deals an additional 2d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.
